quotes.quote: Idealism is what precedes experience; cynicism is what follows.
quotes.author: David T. Wolf

quotes.quote: The power of accurate observation is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A cynic is a man who, when he smells flowers, looks around for a coffin.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: My pessimism extends to the point of even suspecting the sincerity of the pessimists.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Cynicism is an unpleasant way of saying the truth.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: No matter how cynical you get, it is impossible to keep up.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: What is a cynic? A man who knows the price of everything and the value of nothing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Cynicism is not realistic and tough. It's unrealistic and kind of cowardly because it means you don't have to try.
quotes.author: Peggy Noonan

quotes.quote: Cynics regarded everybody as equally corrupt... Idealists regarded everybody as equally corrupt, except themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: A cynic is not merely one who reads bitter lessons from the past, he is one who is prematurely disappointed in the future.
quotes.author: Sidney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Never be a cynic, even a gentle one. Never help out a sneer, even at the devil.
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay
